opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hargrove, Appellant.
Submitted November 13, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Willie Hargrove, appellant, in propria persona.
Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 3, 1968:
